attributes.action: Ban animal testing on all cosmetics sold in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It’s cruel and unnecessary! We don’t NEED cosmetics they are a luxury and why should animals be tested on for somebody to have the luxury of wearing cosmetics! We need to stop this! There are plenty of brands that are Cruelty-free. So it can be done and all brands that are sold in the UK should have to be Cruelty-free!
attributes.background: Make animal testing for cosmetics Illegal in the UK, and to also ban brands from being sold in the UK that are willing to test on animals in other countries.
